name: part_005
file: tmp_【3D CONCERT】KIARA & FRIENDS： H!P Cover Song Spring Concert #HPmeetsHoloEN [jjLLByDa3Xc]_gemini-3-flash-preview/reencoded/part_005.mov

scenes.description: Kiara and guests Ina, Fuwawa, and Mococo finish performing 'Amanojaku'.
Kiara holds an MC segment, reflecting on the special guest performances with Ame, Ina, Nerissa, and FuwaMoco.
Kiara, Kronii, and Nerissa perform 'Nanchatte Ren'ai' in a new ballroom setting.

subtitles.original: Ehh! Teggan!
subtitles.english: Ehh! Teggan!

subtitles.original: Who would've thought? This is just how it goes here.
subtitles.english: Who would've thought? This is just how it goes here.

subtitles.original: Bye bye girls!
subtitles.english: Bye bye girls!

subtitles.original: Well that was our next big part,
subtitles.english: Well that was our next big part,

subtitles.original: the first half or so of the nice super awesome special guest segment!
subtitles.english: the first half or so of the nice super awesome special guest segment!

subtitles.original: The first song was... Gachinko de Ikou!
subtitles.english: The first song was... Gachinko de Ikou!

subtitles.original: It was performed with... people and...
subtitles.english: It was performed with... people and...

subtitles.original: I want to hear you in the chat!
subtitles.english: I want to hear you in the chat!

subtitles.original: Ame! Ame!
subtitles.english: Ame! Ame!

subtitles.original: That's right, yeah, I managed to finally get Ame back for a performance.
subtitles.english: That's right, yeah, I managed to finally get Ame back for a performance.

subtitles.original: And if anyone would make that happen, you know it would be
subtitles.english: And if anyone would make that happen, you know it would be

subtitles.original: number one teammate Takanashi Kiara, right? Of course it was.
subtitles.english: number one teammate Takanashi Kiara, right? Of course it was.

subtitles.original: Ah, I miss her already.
subtitles.english: Ah, I miss her already.

subtitles.original: The song was from Buono!, which is a special unit that came together with
subtitles.english: The song was from Buono!, which is a special unit that came together with

subtitles.original: two members of Berryz Kobo and one from ℃-ute. Yes,
subtitles.english: two members of Berryz Kobo and one from ℃-ute. Yes,

subtitles.original: they're so awesome, they're so legendary.
subtitles.english: they're so awesome, they're so legendary.

subtitles.original: Speaking of Berryz Kobo, after that came Watashi no Mirai no Dannasama
subtitles.english: Speaking of Berryz Kobo, after that came Watashi no Mirai no Dannasama

subtitles.original: with special guests Ina, Ina, Ina
subtitles.english: with special guests Ina, Ina, Ina

subtitles.original: and Nerissa, the super tall one!
subtitles.english: and Nerissa, the super tall one!

subtitles.original: That song is one of my favorite songs from Berryz Kobo,
subtitles.english: That song is one of my favorite songs from Berryz Kobo,

subtitles.original: and it's about finding the ideal 'husbando'. 'Husband', Dannasama is husband.
subtitles.english: and it's about finding the ideal 'husbando'. 'Husband', Dannasama is husband.

subtitles.original: The height difference from Ina and Nerissa was kind of crazy in that one.
subtitles.english: The height difference from Ina and Nerissa was kind of crazy in that one.

subtitles.original: Is that what they call a moe gap?
subtitles.english: Is that what they call a moe gap?

subtitles.original: I think so.
subtitles.english: I think so.

subtitles.original: And then we had Amanojaku performed by our guest Ina again
subtitles.english: And then we had Amanojaku performed by our guest Ina again

subtitles.original: and Fuwawa and Mococo. Together they are FuwaMoco!
subtitles.english: and Fuwawa and Mococo. Together they are FuwaMoco!

subtitles.original: Bau bau bau bau! Yeah!
subtitles.english: Bau bau bau bau! Yeah!

subtitles.original: It's from another one of my favorite idol groups from Hello! Project called S/mileage.
subtitles.english: It's from another one of my favorite idol groups from Hello! Project called S/mileage.

subtitles.original: They were made up of four members, but they quickly had some graduations
subtitles.english: They were made up of four members, but they quickly had some graduations

subtitles.original: and added many members, and they have since been renamed to ANGERME.
subtitles.english: and added many members, and they have since been renamed to ANGERME.

subtitles.original: Amanojaku was actually their debut song, so it's super sweet and innocent.
subtitles.english: Amanojaku was actually their debut song, so it's super sweet and innocent.

subtitles.original: Fitting these members that we had, right?
subtitles.english: Fitting these members that we had, right?

subtitles.original: I agree too.
subtitles.english: I agree too.

subtitles.original: Next up is another song, but let's head over to a new place.
subtitles.english: Next up is another song, but let's head over to a new place.

subtitles.original: The one up there. We shall go in there, okay?
subtitles.english: The one up there. We shall go in there, okay?

subtitles.original: Will you follow me?
subtitles.english: Will you follow me?

subtitles.original: Okay, I'll take the way around, I won't go directly,
subtitles.english: Okay, I'll take the way around, I won't go directly,

subtitles.original: I'll go there. Okay.
subtitles.english: I'll go there. Okay.

subtitles.original: Follow me! Bye bye!
subtitles.english: Follow me! Bye bye!

subtitles.original:
なんちゃって恋愛
Lyrics, Music: Tsunku Arrangement: Okubo Kaoru
subtitles.english:
Nanchatte Ren'ai (Just Kidding Romance)
Lyrics, Music: Tsunku Arrangement: Kaoru Okubo

subtitles.original: あくびが一つ出ちゃうほど
subtitles.english: So much so that a yawn escapes me

subtitles.original: つまらない午後になったな
subtitles.english: It's become a boring afternoon

subtitles.original: ナンパとかしなきゃいられぬかな
subtitles.english: Do I have to go out and flirt or something?

subtitles.original: シラケちゃう
subtitles.english: It's a real buzzkill

subtitles.original: しばらくは元気なキャラで
subtitles.english: For a while, I've lived with a cheerful persona

subtitles.original: なんとなく生きてきたけど
subtitles.english: And somehow managed to get by

subtitles.original: 気が付けば色気も出てきてるみたい
subtitles.english: Before I knew it, I seem to have developed some sexiness

subtitles.original: みたい
subtitles.english: Or so it seems

subtitles.original: ああだのこうだの私
subtitles.english: With "this and that", I...

subtitles.original: 言うことが足りないたび
subtitles.english: Every time words fail me

subtitles.original: 泣きたい気持ちになる ハハッ
subtitles.english: I feel like crying, haha

subtitles.original: Oh baby 夢も全部真剣だから
subtitles.english: Oh baby, because even my dreams are serious

subtitles.original: 大人になる条件を 教えてほしい
subtitles.english: I want you to tell me the requirements for becoming an adult

subtitles.original: だけどなんだかめんどくさい
subtitles.english: But somehow it's a bit of a hassle

subtitles.original: そのうちテレビを買い替えないと いけないね
subtitles.english: Before long, I'll have to buy a new TV, won't I?

subtitles.original: なんちゃって恋愛をしたとこで
subtitles.english: Even if I have a "just kidding" romance

subtitles.original: 寂しくなるだけ
subtitles.english: It'll just make me lonely

subtitles.original: それなのにぬくもりを 感じたくなる
subtitles.english: And yet, I still want to feel some warmth

subtitles.original: なんちゃっていい奴を演じても
subtitles.english: Even if I act like a "just kidding" nice person

subtitles.original: 虚しくなるだけ
subtitles.english: It'll just leave me empty

subtitles.original: それなのに適当に 愛想笑い
subtitles.english: And yet, I still give a half-hearted fake smile

subtitles.original: ハンバーガー かじりながら
subtitles.english: While biting into a hamburger
